snippet: Recent eruptions of deadly violence have been sparked by rumors of harm to cows, which are considered sacred by the country’s Hindu majority.
abstract: New Delhi officials confirm Muslim man died and four others were wounded in latest episode of sectarian violence sparked by rumor or accusation of violence against cattle, which are considered sacred by Hindus.

byline.original: By HARI KUMAR and DAVID BARSTOW

lead_paragraph: Recent eruptions of deadly violence have been sparked by rumors of harm to cows, which are considered sacred by the country’s Hindu majority.

headline.main: Cattle Become a Trigger for Sectarian Violence in India
headline.print_headline: Rumors About Cattle Stir Deadly Violence in India
